text: Anshuman Singh (7 July 1935 â€“ 8 March 2021) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Rajasthan from 1999 until 2003. He also was Governor of Gujarat from 1998 until 1999. He died from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in India.Ex-Rajasthan Governor Anshuman Singh dies due to COVID ==References== ==Other websites== * Anshuman Singh Category:Governors of Rajasthan Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Gujarat Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India
title: Anshuman Singh (politician)
